name: frontend-boilerplate
description: A template for a vanilla html, css, js project. Using eslint, prettier, stylelint, babel and browsersync.
author: cokaps016016

scripts.cz: git add . && git-cz && git push origin main
scripts.lintci-stylelint: echo Linting With Stylelint... && stylelint src/css/**/*.css && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && stylelint src/css/**/*.css --fix && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1))
scripts.lintci-eslint: echo Linting With Eslint... &&  yarn eslint --format github --ext .js --quiet && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && yarn eslint --ext .js --fix --quiet && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1))
scripts.lintci-prettier: echo Linting With Prettier... && yarn prettier --check . && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && yarn prettier -w . && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1))
scripts.lint-stylelint: echo Linting With Stylelint... && stylelint src/css/**/*.css && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed && exit 1)
scripts.lint-eslint: echo Linting With Eslint... &&  yarn eslint --ext .js --quiet && echo Lint passed.|| (echo Lint failed && exit 1)
scripts.lint-prettier: echo Linting With Prettier... && yarn prettier --check . && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed && exit 1)
scripts.fixlint-stylelint: echo Fixing Lint Issues With Stylelint... && stylelint src/css/**/*.css --fix && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.fixlint-eslint: echo Fixing Lint Issues With Eslint... && yarn eslint --ext .js --fix --quiet && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.fixlint-prettier: echo Fixing Lint Issues With Prettier... && yarn prettier -w . && echo Fix generated successfully. || (echo Fix failed! && exit 1)
scripts.lintci: concurrently "yarn:lintci-*" && echo Please apply the following diff using git apply && git diff
scripts.fixlint: concurrently "yarn:fixlint-*" && echo Please apply the diff
